entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , La Grande-Quatre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:06 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -28.9°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
